  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    goal.core.runtime.service.agent.RunState.addPercept(Percept)
    percepts should be communicated to the agent through Capabilities#getPercepts().
    goal.core.kr.KRlanguage.makeExpressionGraph() 
    goal.core.runtime.RuntimeManager.resetAgent(AgentId)
    use Agent.reset() instead
    goal.core.runtime.RuntimeManager.restartAgent(AgentId)
    use Agent.reset() instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    languageTools.program.agent.AgentId(String)
    you should not use this, as agent names always should match the messaging name.
